attributes.action: reject Mandelson's disconnection proposal for filesharing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mandelson has laid out his intentions to submit legislation to parliament that would cut persistent file sharers off the web entirely, after a couple of warnings.

We believe that this is an infringement on our freedom of speech. We should be able to share files freely and we do not believe that the government has the right to decide what files are permissible to share or not.

We want this proposal rejected outright.
